previewArticle.title: Croatia vs. Mexico: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group A Preview

recapArticle.title: Croatia 1, Mexico 3: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group A Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Foul by Rafael Márquez (Mexico).
Luka Modric (Croatia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay in match Luka Modric (Croatia) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Matt Oswin
timelineItems.text: No imaginary yellow there; Rakitic getting plenty of the Mexican #WorldCup #CROvMEX

timelineItems.text: You'll never see Jurgen asking for the opposing team to get yellows like Miguel Herrera. It's very unprofessional. #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: WHAT A PASS by Mexico there, shame that the touch wasn't of the same quality, bright start from Croatia though, as expected #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Jack Parsonage
timelineItems.text: Chances of another dynamite performance from Ochoa? Might need it here, but Mexico should still be adventurous. #WorldCup2014 #CROvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Héctor Herrera (Mexico) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Oribe Peralta.

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: #CRO looking more dangerous currently. Enjoying far more possession in opponents' half. #CROvMEX #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Roger Willis
timelineItems.text: Aw maan! #mex So unlucky! #CROvMEX! #mex Vamos Mexico! #mex #vamosmexico #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Bogdan Pasat
timelineItems.text: I am rooting for Croatia but loving the way Mexico plays. Bravo El Tri. Now Vamos Hrvatska! #CROvMEX #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: DJ Void
timelineItems.text: Remembered I have a picture in picture feature on my TV so watching both matches at once. Won't miss a thing #WorldCup #CAMvBRA #CROvMEX

timelineItems.desc:
Re-live the best moments of Mexico vs. Croatia Group A match in Recife, Brazil.

Catch all MLSsoccer.com's World Cup coverage at www.mlssoccer.com/worldcup
timelineItems.title: World Cup in Pictures: Mexico cruise into knockout round with three 2nd half goals

timelineItems.text: damn Mexico, laying on the pressure for a team that just needs a draw #CROvMEX

timelineItems.text: I’ve been watching the #CROvMEX game. Mexico are a cracking team with no stars. Brilliant.

timelineItems.text: Can't tell which is likelier: Mexico's manger A) having a coronary, B) a stroke, or C) spontaneously combusting #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: Rakitic caught 100% pure ball watching, he was waiting to counter to go forward unfortunately, poor, true GG then, Mexico go on #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Roger Willis
timelineItems.text: If this was boxing they'd stop it now. It's getting to be cruel. #mex! #CROvMEX! Vamos Mexico! #vamosmexico #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Derrick4Real
timelineItems.text: The sleeping giant has awoken. #CROvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ante Rebic (Croatia).
Javier Hernández (Mexico) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt blocked. Marco Fabián (Mexico) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Croatia. Conceded by Héctor Moreno.

timelineItems.name: Vicki D.
timelineItems.text: Watched of all #CROvMEX and got bored and when I checked the score 10 minutes later, Mexico scored 3 goals. #Ilovesoccer

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Croatia. Conceded by Carlos Peña.

timelineItems.name: Ziauddin Khalifa
timelineItems.text: Javier 'Chicharito' Hernandez scores for Mexico. As usual dealing with his movement n positioning. Poor Croatia. #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Leo
timelineItems.text: If you need me I'll be in a dark corner in the fetal position for the next little bit. #CROvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Rafael Márquez (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nikica Jelavic (Croatia).

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Allegre
timelineItems.text: Good job Croatia! Great assist. #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Josh Elliott
timelineItems.text: Remember when this was scoreless? Like...five minutes ago? #CROvMEX #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Gabriela Palacios Fl
timelineItems.text: Wow, the beautiful game! Jogo bonito! #CMRvBRA #CROvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Carlos Peña (Mexico) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ante Rebic (Croatia).
José Juan Vázquez (Mexico) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Croatia).

timelineItems.name: Šçøtt Śvëñ Wåłłš
timelineItems.text: Huh, had I been forced to wager, I totally would have picked #MEX to finish w/ 10 men. #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Sean Smith
timelineItems.text: Thats a red card similar to Henderson v Citeh. No complaints. #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Treble Nikki
timelineItems.text: I *knew* there'd be a red card in one of these games. #CROvMEX #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jane
timelineItems.text: I note the Croatian's have very good skin #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Carlos
timelineItems.text: This picture is too perfect ���#CROvMEX #FifaWorldCup http://t.co/2kc4xIL0Im

timelineItems.name: Stephanie Hale-Lopez
timelineItems.text: OMG this game really picked up in the last few minutes!! #CROvMEX saving all the action for the end!!! #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Carlos
timelineItems.text: This picture is too perfect ���#CROvMEX #FifaWorldCup http://t.co/2kc4xIL0Im

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ivan Perisic (Croatia) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross.
Offside, Croatia. Ivan Perisic tries a through ball, but Mario Mandzukic is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: I would say that Perisic almost made things slightly interesting for Croatia at the end there but apparently there was an offside #CROvMEX

timelineItems.name: Ntokozo Sean Mnabe
timelineItems.text: Lol Perisic can't believe how Ochoa managed to block that shot... And seems like the linesman is also blind #CROvMEX

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dejan Lovren (Croatia).
Javier Hernández (Mexico) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Second Half ends, Croatia 1, Mexico 3.
